item.title: Black+Decker Home How-To Guides Encore

Looking for a step-by-step guide on how to frame a wall? Are you at a loss trying to set up your patios and walkways? Youâ€™re covered for all these topics and more. Pay what you want for a lifetime of home improvement confidence and help support It Gets Better with your purchase.

This multi-book collection features bestselling titles like The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue, A Darker Shade of Magic, The Fragile Threads of Power, and more. item.title: Hacking 2024 by No Starch
item.content:encoded: Level up your hacking and cyber security skills with this bursting tech bundle from No Starch! Get professional level resources for both novice and seasoned hackers, and help support the Electronic Frontier Foundation and ACLU Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Become a Python Expert by Pearson Encore

Learn Python 3 the Hard Way gives you a rigorous crash course where youâ€™ll create working code regardless of your level. Get all these and more, and help support Girls Make Games Scholarship Fund with your purchase!

item.title: A Wizard of Earthsea and More by Ursula K. Le Guin

item.content:encoded:
Explore the worlds and stories of author Ursula K. Le Guin with another great Humble Book Bundle! This 25+ book collection features A Wizard of Earthsea, Tehanu, Tales from Earthsea, and more from one of speculative fictionâ€™s most renowned authors. Your purchase helps support Literary Arts, a nonprofit located within Le Guinâ€™s community. Lose yourself in this expansive library today.

The titles in this bundle are available on Kobo.com. To access them, create or log in to your Kobo.com account. Please note that the content redemption deadline is December 15, 2027 at 11:00 AM PDT.

item.title: Pathfinder Second Edition "Happy Birthday, Remaster!" Bundle from Paizo Inc.
